com.rift.coad.util.connection - package com.rift.coad.util.connection
 
Connection - Interface in com.rift.coad.util.connection
This object defines the connection interface that will be used to manage a connection to a object.
ConnectionException - Exception in com.rift.coad.util.connection
This exception will get thrown when there is an error while accessing a connection.
ConnectionException() - Constructor for exception com.rift.coad.util.connection.ConnectionException
Creates a new instance of ConnectionException without detail message.

Constructs an instance of ConnectionException with the specified detail message.

Constructs an instance of ConnectionException with the specified detail message.
ConnectionHandler - Class in com.rift.coad.util.connection
This object is responsible for controlling the Proxy wrapping of any RMI classes in the connection manager.
ConnectionHandler(RMIConnection, Object) - Constructor for class com.rift.coad.util.connection.ConnectionHandler
Creates a new instance of ConnectionHandler.
ConnectionManager - Class in com.rift.coad.util.connection
This object is responsible for managing the connections to various JNDI bound objects.
